snippet: In the back room of an auto school in Brooklyn, drummers from La Troupe Makandal and dancers from La Troupe Zetwal organize lessons in traditional Haitian drumming and dance.
abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on La Difference Auto School in East Flatbush, Brooklyn, offering driving lessons in English, French, Creole and Spanish by day and Haitian drumming and dance circles on weekends.
lead_paragraph: In the back room of an auto school in Brooklyn, drummers from La Troupe Makandal and dancers from La Troupe Zetwal organize lessons in traditional Haitian drumming and dance.

headline.print_headline: Haitian Rhythms You Can Hear From the Street
headline.seo: Haitian Rhythm Lessons You Can Hear From the Street
headline.main: Haitian Rhythms You Can Hear From the Street
